# mapAttributeOverRaster
```{r}
library(magicVis)
library(raster)
library(sp)

data(meuse.grid)
coordinates(meuse.grid) = ~x+y
gridded(meuse.grid) = TRUE
raster <- raster(meuse.grid[3])

data(meuse)
coordinates(meuse) = ~x+y
vector <- meuse[5]

mapAttributeOverRaster(rst, vec, attr = 1)

```
